or a new workspace.

It seems that either one of the osgi jar has been deleted or that some classes
have been deleted from one of the jars.
Could you compare your jars with the one from a download.

When running some scans on my machine, two jars inside the eclipse install were 
corrupted on my machine.  The problem is now fixed.  Feel free to close.
Closing as invalid as per the last comment.
